Server.Name: v1.15 Survivalist
Server.Description:
An overhaul vanilla mod for veteran players who find pure vanilla too easy and are seeking a challenge with the vanilla feel. This overhaul mod adds survival that is lacking in the game.
- More wild zombie spawns. - Slower progression to extend the live of a world to 100+ days. - Farming is nerfed so the struggle for food extends to mid game. - Less ammo, food & quantity in loot, less resources when mining and harvesting ores/blocks. - Economy rebalanced so you won't be swimming in dukes and make thoughtful decisions when buying. - A Single Player reworking of the Charismatic Nature perk. (Survival Instinct) - Dying has a harsher consequence, retaining debuffs and hunger, etc. - And much more!
Full list of changes can be found here: https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/22254-7-years-to-die-survivor-desolate-interloper-exile-survivor-v115-a193/
